Feb 1 (Reuters) - 3i Infrastructure PLC 3IN.L:: *3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC - ON-TRACK TO MEET FY22 DIVIDEND TARGET OF 10.45 PENCE PER SHARE, A YEAR-ON-YEAR INCREASE OF 6.6% *3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC - OVERALL PORTFOLIO HAS PERFORMED WELL IN 1 OCT TO 31 DEC 2021, MEETING OR EXCEEDING EXPECTATIONS WE SET IN SEPTEMBER 2021


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 01-FEB-202206:59:24.57 GMT
